page.title: 07Local News
page.content: { Water Tower Recently North Anston water tower has been dismantled. It was visible from the A57 so people coming to North Anston would not have much trouble getting here.It carried the water of North and South Anston. It was taken down bit by bit and took about two months to be completely dismantled. {The Royal Visit {Princess Anne}came to{Dinnington}on {May 31st 1985}to collect a cheque for Â£23,000 for Save The Children Fund. Alvin Stardust opened the garden party.The garden party was held at Deans hall because Mr. Dean (Jr) is the local organiser of the Charity.It turned out to be a successful day with many stars of t.v and music attending. {Dinnington Fun Run {On Sunday 30th of June 1985}Dinnington Trader organised a fun run for the
